title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Updates to the Creator
content:
In addition to the new Drift and Drag Race options, the Creatorâ€™s toolkit also includes new dynamic units usable on all sorts of tracks, including drivers doing donuts, lowriders bouncing on hydraulics, animated crowds, and more.

Creators can also launch tests from any chosen checkpoint on a racetrack, choose to race multiple rounds in Drag Races, among other improvements designed to help the community create and share amazing Races, Deathmatches, and more.
